Description: The 210 Squall is a Home-On-Jam/Anti-Radiation cruise missile, designed to guide itself directly onto warships deploying sensor jamming tactics. The Squall will only home in on jamming signals, and cannot be used to seek targets independently. Size: 2 Cruise Speed: 200 m/s Range: 14,000 m Warhead: Type: Explosive Impact Armor Penetration: 150 cm Component Damage: 1200 hp Blast Angle: 70 Seeker: Type: Home on Jam - RADAR Range: 1,000 m FOV: 90 deg Supports TRPs: No
